data.name: The Cycle: Frontier - Professional Pack
data.detailed_description:
An unprepared Prospector won't last long on Fortuna III, so give yourself some love with two unique outfits, unique weapon skins, a fair amount of Aurum, and a good bit of extra kit! What's not to like?
Your Aurum balance and Cosmetic items are not affected by seasonal wipes, and any K-Marks and Gear from the packs will be regranted each season!

  • 625 Aurum
  • 50000 Kmarks
  • 2x S-576 PDW
  • 2x C-32 Bolt Action
  • 2x Scarab
  • 2x Helmet (Common)
  • 2x Shield (Common)
  • 4x Medium Backpack
  • Professional Scarab
  • Professional Blade
  • Professional Wrangler Basesuit
  • Professional Wrangler Vest
  • Professional Wrangler Boots
  • Professional Wrangler Gloves
  • Professional Storm Runner Basesuit
  • Professional Storm Runner Chestpiece
  • Professional Storm Runner Boots
  • Professional Storm Runner Gloves

data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 2GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 4GB VRAM
